Package de.mdelab.simulator.validators

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentLifeCycleAdaptationValidator
    Validates a self-adaptation that adjust the life cycle state of a Component (see Component.getState()), for instance, to start or stop a component.
    ComponentReplacementValidator
    Validates a self-adaptation whether it replaces a Component with a Component of another ComponentType.
    ComponentStateValidator
    Retrieves all Components of all Tenant architectures ordered by their states (see Component.getState() and grouped by their Tenants.
    ExceptionValidator
    Validates for each Tenant architecture if and how many Exceptions are thrown by ProvidedInterfaces.
    MinConfigurationValidator
    Validates for a minimal configuration of each Tenant architecture.
    ParameterValidator
    Validates for each Tenant architecture whether each Parameter of a ComponentState.STARTED Component has a value assigned (see Parameter.getValue()).
    ProvidedInterfaceValidator
    Validates each Tenant architecture whether its ComponentState.STARTED Components provide together all given interfaces such that the tenant actually provides the necessary functionality to be operable.
    RequiredInterfaceValidator
    Validates for each Tenant architecture whether each RequiredInterface is connected to a ProvidedInterface of a ComponentState.STARTED Component within the same Tenant.
